thoughts.text: I was not able to find contact information for Instituto Hemingway on their website. I think I should try to use the Twitter API to contact them and ask for more information about the online Spanish writing course for heritage speakers.
thoughts.reasoning: I was not able to find contact information for Instituto Hemingway on their website. It seems like the best course of action would be to try to use the Twitter API to contact them and ask for more information about the online Spanish writing course for heritage speakers.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the Twitter API to contact Instituto Hemingway and ask for more information about the online Spanish writing course for heritage speakers
- Practice speaking and writing in Spanish consistently
